alert.note: Alert for Pima; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 4:43PM MST until August 18 at 5:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pima County in southeastern Arizona... Southwestern Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 530 PM MST. * At 443 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ajo, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Ajo, Pisinemo, Gu Vo, Hickiwan, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument, San Simon, Why, Charco 27, Ventana, Gunsight, Vaya Chin, Santa Cruz, Kuakatch and San Simon West. TIME...MOT...LOC 2343Z 186DEG 107KT 3235 11278 THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
